inclusion.criterion: Strictures must predominantly include the proximal and/or mid bulbar urethra
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: otherwise amenable to buccal graft onlay urethroplasty
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Strictures may extend from the mid-bulbar urethra up to the distal bulbar urethra within the scrotum, but not through the scrotum to the pendulous junction
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects able to consent for themselves
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior open urethral surgery, such as prior urethroplasty
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a severe bulbar urethral stricture that is amenable to buccal graft onlay urethroplasty.
